devdoc.details: ERC20 token standard: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20 As seen here: https://github.com/ConsenSys/Tokens/blob/master/contracts/Token.sol

params._owner: The address of the account owning tokens
params._spender: The address of the account able to transfer the tokens

allowance(address,address).return: Amount of remaining tokens allowed to spent

params._spender: The address of the account able to transfer the tokens
params._value: The amount of tokens to be approved for transfer

approve(address,uint256).return: Whether the approval was successful or not

params._owner: The address from which the balance will be retrieved

params._value: The amount of token to be transferred

transfer(address,uint256).return: Whether the transfer was successful or not

params._value: The amount of token to be transferred

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).return: Whether the transfer was successful or not

devdoc.title: ERC20Interface

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: send `_value` token to `_to` from `_from` on the condition it is approved by `_from`
